review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2021
review.title: Controller broken/packaged like garbage/decent PS4
review.review: When I first got the package I was amazed how horribly the PS4, controller, and cables were wrapped. Big box with 2 sheets of packing so the unit obviously bounced around a lot. The PS4 slim itself doesn’t have many cosmetic issues, but the USB ports have corrosion. When turned on, it says there is too many USB connections. The controller looked like someone found it in the garbage. The power port on the front is broken and you can clearly see the chip damaged.

review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
review.title: I was duped
review.review: I bought my ps4 quite a while ago and will NOT be purchasing one again, nor will I purchase products related to it. I was tricked. I bought my ps4 only to find out that it came from a foreign country and the software is just different enough that none of the dlc works. I paid for the dlc to Fallout 4 and it simply won't install after download. Contacted Sony, they didn't care. Contacted Amazon, got the same result. So I'm stuck with a $280 junk console that I can't add anything to. Also, I bought Fallout 4 at the same time and until now it said nothing about it being an imported version. Amazon lies and rips off customers. So unless you live in South America, don't waste your money. Total bs.

review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
review.title: AVOID BUYING ELECTRONICS FROM THIS COMPANY!
review.review: I dont take the time to review products often, but I cant stress enough to STAY AWAY from this company when purchasing any type of electronics. I ordered the PS4 bundle with the spiderman game and 2nd controller. First off, the 2nd controller didnt come with the original bundle. I had to waste time going back and forth with them to finally send me the 2nd controller, which came about a week after the original bundle. Fast forward to Christmas day. My son finally gets to open his gift, only to find out that each game we tried, gets the error message that I attached in the photo. The system clearly didnt work and we decided to return it. The return process was going smoothly, until I noticed I was missing 157.00 from my return. I reached out to get an explanation and they claimed that it worked and they were taking 157.00 for a no longer needed fee. If it worked as promised from the start, there wouldve been no need for me to return it in the first place. In sumarry, im getting my lawyer involved to recoup my full refund!! JUST DO YOURSELF A FAVOR, AVOID THIS COMPANY!
product.title: Holiday Family Bundle Sony Playstation 4 1TB Slim- Jet Black

The PS4 system itself is great and has held up well, though tends to need a dusting every so often or it will run louder/hotter. Other than that, haven't had any issues. Watch DVDs, use any streaming services, play games, what more are you really looking for?

review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
review.title: Shipped/arrived on time and the PS4 works as if new
review.review: Was shipped within a couple hours of purchasing and arrived when it was supposed to(2 or 3 day shipping), also performs as if it were brand new.However, this was sent to the wrong person. The receipt in the package had the name and address of another buyer, but it was the correct item so the other buyer and I both got what we were expecting. This is just a note for the seller, it could have led to the two of us being sent the wrong item but luckily we bought the same thing so it worked out fine.My only concern is that a random person now has my name and address, and I’m sure he/she doesn’t like that idea either.Also the PS4 controller is custom and from an unknown design/game which was a cool bonus.The controller charger cable is also a generic micro usb which is much shorter than the PS4 stock cable but besides this it still works just the same as the original.Overall very pleased with this purchase

product.title: Sponsored Ad - Demon Slayer: The Hinokami Chronicles - PlayStation 4

review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2021
review.title: Fun and follows the series
review.review: I'm not really into fighting games, but it made me think of the DBZ games so I went for it. I am a fan of Demon Slayer and was excited to see a game for it. I am impressed that all the original English VAs from the anime are in this game. The visuals are stunning and the fighting is unique depending on the character. The game follows the anime/manga all the way through to the Mugen Train arc.I took off a star because: Tanjiro has the same type of responses when talking to people in towns. The roster is fairly small for a fighting game and you have to go through story mode in order to unlock more characters. (You could also grind away in multi-player to unlock characters but it's way faster to do it through story mode). I hope more variety is added character wise later on. Once you finish story mode there's not much replay value unless you enjoy online multi-player. Another thing that was a little annoying: most of this game is cutscene heavy. I understand it is for retelling the entire story, but I felt like I spent most of my time watching vs playing.IF YOU ARE A STREAMER..... be warned there are stream restrictions in place, so make sure you look into it before attempting to stream.I do recommend this game if you're a fan of the series, I did throughly enjoy playing the game.
product.title: Sponsored Ad - Demon Slayer: The Hinokami Chronicles - PlayStation 4

review.review_data: Reviewed in Canada on October 18, 2021
review.title: Not worth the full $90 price in my opinion…But…Depends on what your looking for out of this…
review.review: Visuals look amazing!!! But…I find the story gameplay to be way too linear…Kinda reminds me of how linear FFXIII was…As in the map…Your just walking in straight lines to get to your point of destination with fights in between…Just the way the story gameplay is executed…Feels bland…And not that interesting…The storyline itself I like…As I’m a fan of demon slayer…Just not the story gameplay…Also…It’s more watching the story I find…Rather than more playing…It’s a short one with 8 Chapters…Well 9…If you count the prologue…Combat is the best part of the game…It’s fun…Fast paced…Yet simple…Although…I find it to be just a tad bit too simplistic…And repetitive…Which…Simple gameplay mechanics isn’t necessarily a bad thing…It still can be fun…I just think it would’ve been better…And more fun to execute combos with a mixture of different button combinations…Rather than just pressing the square button most of the time…As far as game modes…There’s just only 2 modes…Story…And Versus…Wish there were more single player modes…Like a survival mode…Or endless mode…Having the online play is great…And all…But…When you don’t play much online…Like me…It leaves the game with little to do…And gets boring quickly…Character roster is small…A total of 18 characters…Kinda disappointing…It’s also disappointing to see that the bottom characters are just some of the same characters…Just with different outfits…Waste of character space in my opinion…All those same character spots could have been added with completely different characters…But…I read online that there will be DLC characters coming…So…The roster could get better in time…Overall…The game is alright…I just think it’s lacking content with characters…And game modes…Kinda makes me feel like I should have waited for a price drop on this…Don’t think it’s worth the full price of $90 in my opinion for what little amount of content you get…If you just wanna get it because your a fan of demon slayer…Like me…Or anime fighting in general…Then…Go for it…Or if your just gonna play it for the online portion only…And don’t care about the lack of single player/game modes…Then…Yeah…Go for it…But…If you don’t play much online…Like me…And were looking for more content out of this in terms of single player/game modes…Then…I would wait for a price drop…3/5stars…
product.title: Sponsored Ad - Demon Slayer: The Hinokami Chronicles - PlayStation 4

review.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
review.title: Super fun & addictive!
review.review: OMGGGG! Best Star Wars game in PSVR mode ever! 3 episodes of awesome cinematography & immersive fun !The only initial issue I was struggling with, is the controls as I constantly stepped out of the play area. But very soon, I figured out all I needed to do is stay put, and I can press the main button on the motion controller to teleport my character where I wanna go, and I can press either square or triangle to toggle my direction left or right to position my character to face centrally!Another annoying thing is the resolution… but this is something which requires an upgrade to the whole psvr system. I bet the oculus quest 2 would have amazing experience with this game! Hope PS4 VR will soon upgrade so I can truly experience these superb episodes in its well deserved resolution!Can’t wait to play again! It’s a MUST BUY for all vr gamers!
